content: Enact your wildest espionage fantasies by recording your surroundings using this spy video watch. This James Bond inspired gadget fits discreetly on your wrist and is designed to capture twenty minutes of video or forty minutes of audio.

Maintain your room’s modern and elegant decorum by placing this wooden block alarm clock on the nightstand. This compact cube measures 2.4 inches all around and displays time, date, and temperature in highly visible LED numbers.

Make science fun by bringing physics to life with “The Chaos Machine”. This fun and educational kit comes with 56 pieces that you put together to play up to 8 different games that teach you about the chaos theory using pendulums and other moving parts.

See to it that your treats come out just right by following the recipe to the T using this measuring label cake batter dispenser. One side displays measurements in cups while the other side displays in milliliters so you always have the perfect pour.

Protect yourself against automotive insurance scams by installing one of these HD dashboard cameras in your car. This indispensable driving accessory powers on automatically when the engine turns on and records at IMAX theater quality.

Experience a sugar rush of coma inducing levels by taking on this giant ten pound Toblerone bar by yourself. Weighing in at  just under ten pounds, this gigantic bar makes the perfect gift for any one with sweet tooth and a monster appetite.

The inspired and functional design of this pop-up USB makes it possible to keep a handy socket nearby without sacrificing valuable counter space. When not in use, this vertical socket will easily hide underneath the counter.

titleEN: Drunk, Stoned, Or Stupid Card Game
content: Put yourself and all your friends in the hot seat at the next shindig by playing this “Drunk, Stoned, or Stupid” card game. In each round one person acts as a judge and reads a card out loud while everyone else says who in the group should be tagged and why.

Keeping a clean home has never been easier thanks to this Wi-Fi enabled robot vacuum. No matter where you are, you’ll be able to control your smart vac using the app on your smartphone – so you can clean your floors at any time.

Stand apart from the crowd when you go out at night by accessorizing with this LED clutch bag. This wearable piece of art features a compact size and allows you to customize the images on your bag using an App on your phone with over 20 animations.

Use the Force to cleanse your dirty SUV’s rear window with these geektastic lightsaber rear wiper covers. Available in a variety of saber colors – and even in the infamous crossguard style – these wiper covers are a must have for any Star Wars fan.

titleEN: Fan and Light Bulb Pull Chains
content: Now you can easily distinguish which chain is which with the fan and light bulb pull chains – brilliant! These novelty pull chains feature a high quality build and provide a small yet eye-catching detail that’ll make working the light and fan much easier.

Go on an out of this world mission to dreamland by sleeping in the purple galaxy bed covers. These lovely satin covers showcase a mesmerizing image of our vast cosmos with amazing detail and artistry that will captivate your imagination.

Take notes and brainstorm without wasting a ton of paper by writing down everything in this dry erase whiteboard notebook. This eco-friendly notebook features a detachable binding and comes with 25 reusable sheets.

Capture the magic of a full moon during any night of the week with the moon night light. The realistic moon graphic on the night light displays a bright full moon you can turn on and off at the flick of a conveniently positioned switch on the bottom of the light.

Brighten up any room’s decor using this fun cactus plant shaped coaster set. Handmade from birch plywood, each coaster in the set comes with a small notch that allows them to be interlocked and staked upright to form a wooden cactus.

Clear your driveway and walkway without enduring hours of backbreaking labor by firing up this electric snow thrower. The 13 amp motor picks up snow and launches it 30 feet away, creating a clear path 18 inches wide and 10 inches deep.

Teach your tiny human the finer points of relaxation from an early age with this baby hammock. Weighing just 7.5 pounds, this pint-size natural cotton hammock sways gently to lull your baby to sleep while keeping them safe and comfortable.

Steer clear of messes and spills by serving everyone’s drink into these interlocking coffee mugs. The functional design of these ceramic mugs allows you to link them together so you can carry them in one fast and easy trip.

Help keep human errors to a minimum during your next home improvement project by utilizing the digital tape measure. This handy tool makes measuring a breeze as it displays accurate readings on its digital screen that can be set to either U.S. or metric units.

Experience the fun of arcade gaming wherever you go by bringing along one of these tiny playable arcade machines. Built around a modular Arduino platform, each arcade features an OLED screen, analog joystick, and loads games off a microSD.

titleEN: Rugged Convertible Kids Ride On Jeep
content: Get your tiny human hooked on off-roading from an early age by getting them inside this rugged convertible kids ride on Jeep. This luxury vehicle comfortably seats one and can be controlled wirelessly to avoid accidents.

Make your reading nook a little cozier by providing some ambient lighting using this old book scented candle. The candle is made from all natural soy wax and releases a delightful aroma reminiscent of a distinguished library into the air as it burns.

Alter the room’s appearance with the tip of your finger using this smartphone synced mood light. Apart from providing you with dozens of vibrant colors to choose from, it can be programmed to alert you to incoming calls or pulse to the rhythm of your favorite song.

Save yourself a few trips to the kitchen while you watch the tube by popping open your brews using this TV remote control bottle opener. This multi-functional control is compatible with a variety of devices and features a sturdy metallic bottle opener.

Ensure your zombie killing skills stay sharp at all times by practicing them on this impaled zombie pen holder. The holder is cast in durable designer resin and given an amazingly intricate paint job to add a touch of realism to the undead corpse laying on your desk.

The future of formal wear has arrived in the form of this eye-catching light up fiber optic jacket. This luminous garment features a special fiber optic fabric capable of glowing in various vibrant colors such as green, red, and blue.

Gain a better understanding of the elements that make up our world by constructing educational models of them using this magnetic molecular kit. The kit is easy to assemble and comes with the basic building blocks of life – carbon, oxygen and hydrogen atoms.

Get yourself out of a jam quickly if your car won’t start by using this portable car battery jump starter. Though compact, it boasts a powerful 18000mAh battery that lets you start your car about 22 times and features ports so you can charge your USB electronic devices.

Instantly transform your simple tub into a five star delight using the dual jet bath spa. This attachment fits all standard tubs and features adjustable jets and nozzles to create an enthralling whirlpool experience that’ll leave you fully relaxed.

Help your home or work space remain tidy with help from this electrical outlet plug organizer. Made from silicone, it easily sticks onto the wall so that you can conveniently hang the cords of appliances you’re not currently using.

Avoid accidentally burning down your campsite by illuminating the area with this inflatable solar lantern. The lantern charges in only eight hours, and emits a bright white glow that lasts for up to twelve hours, so you’re never left in the dark.

Have a little fun while you relax and booze it up by creating beautiful music with these major scale musical wine glasses. Simply fill your glass to the desired note, moisten your finger, and create a wondrous sound as you run it across the rim of the glass.

Give your home movies some added edge by capturing incredible footage using the 360 degree GoPro camera holder. The design allows you to mount up to six GoPros that face in every direction so you can capture every conceivable shot possible.

Relive your glorious old-school gaming days all over again by accenting your outfit with the Playstation console messenger bag. Styled like the iconic original console, the bag features a main storage compartment, zip-up pocket, and adjustable strap.

Get a bird’s eye view of your surroundings by soaring the skies using the 3DR SmartDrone quadcopter. Powered by two 1 GHz CPUs, it includes features like push button flight and computer assisted shots so that anyone can capture the best footage possible.

Get the kids excited about playing outdoors again by whipping out this giant multi-colored parachute. This versatile parachute provides loads of fun for all and comes in sizes ranging from 6 feet to 30 feet in diameter.

Set your insides on fire by taking on the world’s hottest chili pepper. Verified by the good folks at Guinness World Records, this fiery pepper known as the Carolina Reaper boasts an insanely high 2,200,000 Scoville heat units – that’s more than pepper spray!

Begin your days as if your were an A-List celebrity on set of a Hollywood blockbuster by waking up with this clapperboard digital alarm clock. Styled like the iconic film industry clapperboards, the time and date comes displayed in bright, legible red digits.

Rest easy while your tiny human is out of sight by placing this baby vital signs monitor sock on them. It utilizes pulse oximetry to keep track of your baby’s vitals and is programmed to send you text alerts if anything goes wrong.

Battle the cold by staying warm in more ways than one using these hidden flasks mittens. Apart from shielding your fingers from the frigid weather, the left hand mitten comes equipped with a discreet three ounce flask you can sip from your thumb.

Unleash a zoo in your freezer by making some savory snacks using these zoo animals popsicle molds. The molds are easy to fill and clean – and can be used to create exotic looking frozen treats in the shape of a lion, monkey, polar bear, and elephant – oh my!

Give your performance the ‘wow’ factor it’s been missing by using this color adjustable fog machine. This powerful fog machine comes equipped with 9 built in LEDs that let you alternate between red, green, violet, and blue.

Serve up your delicious melty pie without spilling toppings all over by cutting the slices using this pizza scissors spatula. Once you begin cutting, the slice automatically falls onto the plastic ledge so your slice stays intact until you’re ready to devour it.

Heal those minor lightsaber and blaster related cuts and scrapes with these Star Wars band-aids. Each pack includes 20 sterile band-aids decorated with the series’s most iconic characters like R2-D2, C-3PO, and Darth Vader.

Eliminate dangerous blind spots while on the road by equipping this potentially life saving hand mirror. The small mirror comes with an adjustable Velcro strap, features a vibration free lens, and can be used on either the right or left hand.

Let your imagination flow by creating amazing three dimensional sculptures with this cool ink 3D printing pen. Unlike standard pens that melt the plastic, this cordless pen uses photopolymers solidified by LEDs, so there’s no risk of ever burning your fingers.

Make your kid’s dreams come true by turning his room into a level from his favorite video game using these Minecraft wall graphics. Each decal depicts a detailed image designed to distort the viewer’s perception by creating the illusion the wall is going inward.

Make the outdoors more enjoyable for your beloved doggy by ensuring he stays hydrated using this water bottle bowl for dogs. Simply squeeze the bottle to fill up the small container at the top with a refreshing bowl of water.

Stay comfy while you lounge around on the floor by sandwiching yourself inside this sliced bread chair. Styled like an extra long slice of white bread, the chair folds at its midpoint and can hold a reclining position at several different angles.

Give your ensemble a little eye-catching appeal by toting around this unique 3D cartoon backpack. Made from a durable and flexible canvas, the pack provides ample storage space and a fun animated design guaranteed to get you noticed anywhere you go.

This 4 port blue light mirror hub ensures your devices have a place to charge while simultaneously giving your work area some cool ambient lighting. The compact design fits easily on any desk and works with all kinds of items like laptops, phones, and cameras.

Keep your swimming hole in pristine diving conditions year-round by placing this robotic pool cleaner on the job. It comes with a convenient cartridge filter system that’s easy to clean and is designed to scrub, vacuum, and filter the entire pool in just three hours.

Transition from the college campus to the executive board room without having to transfer your gear from bag to bag by storing your things inside this convertible messenger bag backpack that can alternate between a backpack, briefcase, or messenger bag.

Treat your taste buds to exotic flavors while you rough it in the wild by packing along this dehydrated camping food. Designed by hiking enthusiasts for the great outdoors, the packets offer world class dishes like a delicious thai curry and classic marinara with penne.

Experience the <del>power</del> deliciousness of the Dark Side by using this Death Star waffle maker. This stainless steel waffle maker comes with a special non-stick coating and a regulation thermostat to ensure even browning.

Put your taste buds and anus through the gauntlet by taking on the hot sauce challenge pack. The pack includes an assortment of small .75 ounce bottles containing 12 different kinds of sauces ranging from “mild” to “kick yo’ ass hot”.

Enjoy hours of entertainment while on go without draining your phone’s power using this iPhone battery and gaming controller. This console style controller facilitates gameplay and comes with a 1500 mAh battery ideal for long gaming sessions.

Save bundles on repair costs by patching up dents and scratches using this band-aid car magnet. Simply place this over sized band-aid over your vehicle’s ouchie and the unsightly blemish on your car’s paint job magically disappears.

Ensure you always have a cold beverage at hand by storing your supply in this mirrored touch screen drink cooler. It features a digital touch screen control panel for temperature adjustments and comes with interior LEDs so your drinks are always illuminated.

Create the illusion you’re showering under a secluded waterfall in some exotic location by outfitting your bathroom with this triple shower head. The moment you turn the knob, the three heads douse you with a waterfall-like stream designed to melt your cares away.

Enjoy over 2000 channels of entertainment right at your fingertips using this Roku streaming USB stick. It streams in stunning high definition quality from services like Netflix, YouTube, and even HBO so you can immerse yourself in the action.

Make your little princess’s special day one she’ll never forget by having this giant Hello Kitty balloon drop by for a visit. The balloon measures forty-six inches tall when inflated and comes styled like the iconic children’s cartoon, right down to the iconic pink bow.

Turn almost any spot in your home into the ideal workstation with help from this laptop / tablet / smartphone mobile desk. The intuitive design provides dock slots for a variety of devices while still maintaining ample space for papers and notebooks.

Stop spilling your drink like a sloppy drunk during your next drinking binge by wearing with this wine glass holder necklace. A sturdy neoprene case nestles your glass, freeing up your hands as your glass securely dangles from the removable straps.

Work in total comfort whilst on your computer by securing it in this adjustable laptop stand. The frame is made from a sturdy aluminium alloy which requires no assembly and is designed to handle up to 17 inch laptops.

Persevere against the great outdoors by bringing along this tactical survival shovel. The nearly indestructible head is made from tempered 2Cr13 stainless steel that incorporates various useful tools, making it a must have for doomsday preppers.

Get the perfect shot without worrying about your camera accidentally slipping out of your hands by using this camera clutch strap to secure it. It’s made using sturdy aluminum hardware that can be attached or removed single-handedly in seconds.

Ensure your expensive designer bag remains in perfect condition on rainy days by covering it with this handbag raincoat. This translucent raincoat features a darkened elegant border and covers the entire purse while granting access to the straps.

Kick things up a notch at dessert time by indulging in some spicy chocolate wedges. These delectable morsels combine a rich dark chocolate with a touch of Tabasco sauce to bring you a treat your palette will love and your anus will loathe.

Wash away dirt and grime by bathing in Vader’s tears with this Star Wars Darth Vader showerhead. It features a quick-installation design, flexible tubing so it can be easily moved around, and three different spray settings.

Transform your furry friend into a four legged work of art using this pet hair paint. The paint is made from non-toxic materials that won’t harm your pet or their luxurious coat and is designed to work on all types of hair/fur.

Ensure you and your honey stay dry and bug free next time you go camping by bringing along this bunk bed hammock. Apart from keeping you off the hard ground, the clever design provides protection from rain, insects, and other critters that may be lurking.

Fortify your position with some long range artillery using the water cannon. It stands on a tripod for superb handling and connects to a hose to provide a steady stream of water that can fire at distances of up to 100 feet.

Give your nighttime soiree just the right mood by lighting the place using these inflatable solar powered lanterns. These waterproof lanterns are rechargeable and can be customized with one of seven vibrant hues including a bright white that doubles as a reading light.

Experience what a sugar coma feels like by taking on this 26 pound gummy worm python. Weighing exactly 26.9 pounds, this edible pet comes in a savory sweet cherry flavor and measures 8 feet long, making ideal it to share with your fellow reptile lovers.

Have your date wrapped around your little finger the moment he takes a whiff of your intoxicating fragrance. From the sexually promiscuous playboys that brought you Sure Fuck cologne comes this stimulating aroma designed to make you romantically irresistible.

Get your fussy kids to take their meds without the struggle by pouring it inside this medicine dispensing sippy cup. The clever design of the top allows the medicine to unknowingly be swallowed down with a mouth full of their favorite juice as a chaser.

Get some exercise while you treat the kids to a leisurely ride by taking them on this bicycle stroller. Using modular accessories, you can go from a cargo hauler to a two seater stroller bicycle the kids will positively love.

Become the life of the party by transforming your hands into vibrant glow sticks using these rainbow LED gloves. With small LEDs located at the end of each fingertip, you’ll be able to mesmerize onlookers by turning the darkness into your personal canvas.

Enjoy a cup of Joe even if you’re nowhere near a cafe by dropping one of these instant coffee cubes into a mug of hot water. The cubes come in a compact size that make them easy to take anywhere and are made with Colombian beans from the Ocamonte region.

Read into the wee hours of the night without waking up your spouse by putting on a pair of these reading light glasses. These handy specs come available in five common sizes and are equipped with small battery powered lights to illuminate the pages in front of you.

Help maintain an elegant tone at your next soiree without risking any broken glasses by serving guests using these flexible silicone cups. Made entirely from silicone, they’re designed to bend and bounce upon impact – making them ideal for outdoor use.

Protect your office without use of any fancy security equipment by placing this giant inflatable T-Rex on guard. Made from PVC vinyl, this tyrant lizard features a realistic design as it towers at 126 inches tall – making it perfect for intimidating unwanted guests.

Protect your home and family without the possibility of ending someone’s life by using the non-lethal Salt self defense gun kit. Instead of traditional ammo, it fires bullet-sized pepper spray capsules designed to release a toxin that immediately incapacitates your target.

Turn your little hell raiser into the scourge of the pool by making him captain of this inflatable pirate ship. This one-person vessel features a fun nautical theme and comes with a small pirate sail and squirt gun to annoy everyone at the local watering hole.

Make your masterpieces stand out above all others by creating them using these scratch and sniff coloring pencils. These unique pencils come in a set of twelve and feature fruity and exotic flavors like coconut, watermelon, and strawberry.

Enjoy your garden year round no matter what the weather is like using this easy assembly garden igloo. Made from high quality non-corrosive materials, this versatile eco-friendly geodesic dome can function as a greenhouse, storage space, or indoor playground.

Slice and dice your way through a delicious sushi meal like a noble Jedi with these lightsaber chopsticks. Styled like Luke’s iconic green lightsaber, these pair of chopsticks feature intricately designed hilts and internal LEDs that give it a cool green glow while you eat.

Get ready for that hot date Friday night by keeping your soup bowl haircut looking fresh to def’ using this hair catching barber cape. The innovative design features a raised edge that catches all the falling hair strands before they hit the floor and create a mess.

Always have a trusty set of tools handy for when the going gets rough by carrying this survival tool keychain. Designed for the military, it takes up minimal space and includes an array of tools like screwdrivers and a mini pry bar to help you in a number of situations.

Quench your <del>bloodthirst</del> thirst like any self-respecting mainstreaming vamp by guzzling down a Tru Blood soda. This savory carbonated beverage delivers a slightly tart yet sweet blood orange taste that’s ideal as a Halloween drink themed mixer.

Ensure victory during your next pillow fight by harnessing the power of the Hado martial arts using this Hadoken plush ball. It sports an ultra soft plush exterior ideal for snuggling and comes shaped like the iconic Hadoken fire balls.

Get prehistoric this Halloween season by dressing up in this terrifyingly realistic inflatable T-Rex costume. It is available in both adult and children’s sizes, so you and your little ones can run amok in the neighborhood, getting all the Halloween candy.

Get those <del>freakishly unnatural</del> luscious lips that are all the rage without injecting your face with fillers using the lips plumper. It utilizes non-invasive suction to make your lips appear fuller so you too can become Instagram famous for nothing other than your looks.

Feed your cannibalistic urges without going full out Hannibal Lecter by snacking on some body part gummies. These gluten and fat free treats come in a giant two pound bag and include everything from fingers to delicious braaaaaaiiinssss.

Up your selfie game by snapping the perfect shot using this anti-gravity selfie iPhone case. This one of a kind case features a special nano-suction material that’s designed to stick to most flat surfaces like glass, tile, and metal without making your skin sticky.

Keep your favorite wines fresh long after you open them up by sealing them afterwards using these locking wine bottle stoppers. They feature an easy to use two step locking mechanism to provide an air-tight seal to ensure freshness and prevent spills.

Indulge in some delicious “me” time by unleashing one of these scrumptious cupcake bombs into your bath tub. Made in the shape of a mouth-watering cupcake, it features an intoxicating fruity scent and is designed to simultaneously moisturize and soften the skin.

Make bath time more enjoyable by giving it an awesome soundtrack using this floating duck wireless speaker. You’ll be able to stream music from your smartphone to the yellow duckie via a small battery powered egg shaped transmitter.
